name: Satria Selut
description:
Disclaimer: This game is in very early prototype phase. There might be a huge missing features including in this build. Need to determine if the idea or the gameplay is somehow enjoyable. Any suggestion and feedback would be extremely appreciated. 

 You're a knight that is tasked by the magister to slay slimes in the castle's bottomless basements. Any slime that you've slain will reward you a set amount of golds. Will you able to slay all of the slimes? 

  • Gameplay instructions
    1.  Player Controller
      1.  Move Button - There will a set of green tiles appear beside the player and when click either of the tiles, the player will move onto it. Any movement will cost 1 Action Point.
      2. Attack Button - There will a set of red-ish tiles appear beside the player and when click either of the tiles, the player will attack any slime in it. Any attack that hit slime will cost 1 Action Point.
      3. Player will able to do any movement or turn whenever it is player's turn. Otherwise, the slimes will move by their own. 
  • Important Side Notes
    1. The gameplay is infinite-ish as there will be no boss/ending (not yet) in this phase and the game will end when the player is dead. 
    2. There is no confirmation that the game will be developed fully (aka finished).
